assignments.description: Copy data from get record (containing all fields user can see) into progressNoteDetail variable.
assignments.name: assign_progressNoteDetail
assignments.label: assign progressNoteDetail

assignments.description: Convert the Booleans from the Question screen components into text types so that they could be more easily manipulated in formulas to build plain-text CSSRS results for PN record.
assignments.name: convert_responses_to_strings
assignments.label: convert responses to strings

assignments.description: Save plain text CSSRS results to PN, and set up PN for update.
assignments.name: save_answers_to_progressNote_record
assignments.label: save answers to progressNote record

assignments.description: Capture JSON (from text template) in VCC_CSSRS_Data__c field. Set VCC_Is_CSSRS_Finished__c to true.
assignments.name: save_answers_to_progressNoteDetail_record
assignments.label: save answers to progressNoteDetail record

assignments.description: Initialize the new PN Detail record, setting parent lookup to current recordId
assignments.name: set_up_new_progressNoteDetail_record
assignments.label: set up new progressNoteDetail record

choices.description: a choice labeled as "No" with a value of false
choices.name: choiceNo

choices.description: a choice labeled as "Yes" with a value of true
choices.name: choiceYes

value.stringValue: Over the past month, have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?
Over the past month, have you had any actual thoughts of killing yourself?
Over the past month, have you been thinking about how you might do this?
Over the past month, have you had these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them?
Over the past month, have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself?
At any time in the past month did you intend to carry out this plan?

In your lifetime, have you ever done anything, started to do anything, or prepared to do anything to end your life (for example, collected pills, obtained a gun, gave away valuables, went to the roof but didnâ€™t jump)?
Was this within the past 3 months?

constants.description: CSS classes for icon on vccFlowTitle LWCs
constants.name: TITLELWC_ICONCSS

constants.description: SLDS icon name for vccFlowTitle LWCs
constants.name: TITLELWC_ICONNAME

value.stringValue: Columbia Protocol - Suicide Risk Screening Tool

constants.description: CSS classes for title on vccFlowTitle LWCs
constants.name: TITLELWC_TITLECSS

constants.description: CSS classes for layout of vccFlowTitle LWCs
constants.name: TITLELWC_WRAPPERCSS

decisions.description: Checks if prev get record element found anything. If no, non-owners are directed to dead-end screen (don't create new PN Detail record). If no, but note is signed, owner is directed to dead-end screen (don't create new PN Detail record). If no, owner flows through inserting new PN Detail and performing screening. If yes, capture that PN Detail records data in progressNoteDetail variable
decisions.name: Found_Progress_Note_Detail_Record
decisions.label: Found Progress Note Detail Record?

decisions.description: Read value of PND.VCC_Is_CSSRS_Finished__c checkbox to determine if screening has been completed If not, non-owner is directed to dead-end screen. Or, if not, but PN is signed, direct owner to dead-end screen. Or, if not, and PN isn't signed, direct owner to perform actual Screening. If yes, direct (any) user to results screen.
decisions.name: Has_CSSRS_been_Completed_for_Record
decisions.label: Has CSSRS been Completed for Record?

Flow.description:
The Columbia Protocol asks the veteran a series of questions about suicidality. The outputs are saved to the Progress Note Detail object. The outcome and any questions answered are written back to CPRS
1.18: Added logic to display message to non-owners viewing the Progress Note record, when the screening has not yet been run. Also streamlined variables, labels, and layout of flow.

formulas.description: returns owner Id from Case (which is grandparent record of the PN record)
formulas.name: fxOwnerId

formulas.description: returns first 15 chars of fxOwnerId, for comparing 15-digit Ids
formulas.name: fxOwnerId15

formulas.description: evaluates if Running User owns the Case that is the grand parent of the Progress Note Detail record being manipulated in this flow.
formulas.name: fxUserOwnsCase

Flow.label: VCC Columbia Protocol

recordCreates.description: Insert the PN Detail record (with empty screening data)
recordCreates.name: insert_progressNoteDetail_record
recordCreates.label: insert progressNoteDetail record

recordLookups.description: Get the progress note detail for the record that triggered the screen flow.
recordLookups.name: get_child_PN_Detail_for_current_PN
recordLookups.label: get child PN Detail for current PN

recordLookups.description: Get current Progress Note, so we can read Case__r.OwnerId.
recordLookups.name: get_current_PN
recordLookups.label: get current PN

recordUpdates.description: Update the PN detail record with collected answers
recordUpdates.name: update_progressNoteDetail_record
recordUpdates.label: update progressNoteDetail record

screens.description: Contains actual screening questions. Only reachable by Case owner when screening has not already been completed.
screens.name: Columbia_Protocol
screens.label: Columbia Protocol

fields.name: displayText2
fields.fieldText: {!CSSRSQ2}

fields.name: displayText4
fields.fieldText: {!CSSRSQ4}

screens.description:
Displays message to any user that doesn't own the PN's parent Case record, when Columbia Screening has not been completed.
Can also show message for all users who attempt to run screening after PN has already been signed
screens.name: dead_end_screen
screens.label: dead end screen

fields.name: notRunMessage
fields.fieldText: The CSSRS Suicide Risk screening has not been run.

fields.name: noteSignedMessage
fields.fieldText: IMPORTANT! The Progress Note has been signed. You cannot execute the Columbia screening /CSSRS on a signed Progress Note.

screens.description: Displays screening results in the vccColumbiaProtocol LWC
screens.name: Result_Screen
screens.label: Result Screen

textTemplates.description: builds JSON representation of Columbia screening answers for consumption by vccColumbiaProtocol LWC
textTemplates.name: ColumbiaProtocolAnswersJSON

variables.description: the VCC_Progress_Note__c record manipulated in this flow
variables.name: progressNote

variables.description: the VCC_Progress_Note_Detail__c record manipulated in this flow
variables.name: progressNoteDetail

variables.description: The record Id of the progress note that triggered the screen flow
variables.name: recordId
